    • testRetryWithExceptionClearsMetaCacheUsingRegionException

      public void testRetryWithExceptionClearsMetaCacheUsingRegionException() throws Exception
      Tests that we properly recover from exceptions that DO NOT go through receiveGlobalFailure, due to updating the meta cache for the region which failed. Successful multigets can include region exceptions in the MultiResponse. In that case, it skips receiveGlobalFailure and instead handles in receiveMultiAction
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testRetryWithExceptionClearsMetaCacheUsingServerException

      public void testRetryWithExceptionClearsMetaCacheUsingServerException() throws Exception
      Tests that we properly recover from exceptions that go through receiveGlobalFailure, due to updating the meta cache for the region which failed.
      Throws:
      Exception
